Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Ellis Road** is a road close to the city centre of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It is accessible only by Tanglin Road, and provides access to [The Regent Hotel](/wiki/The_Regent_Hotel). ## History Ellis Road used to be the access road to a cluster of [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language) kampong (hamlet or village) houses. It was referred to by the local Malays as Kampong Tanglin Ellis Road. The village had their own mosque that was demolished in the 1970s to make way for modern commercial buildings. This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Ellis Road
